video.title: The Cleveland Show
video.synopsis: Cleveland Brown moves to his hometown of Stoolbend, Va., where he marries his high school sweetheart in this "Family Guy" spinoff.

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland and Cleveland Jr. leave Quahog and stop in Cleveland's old home town, where he reunites with his high school crush, Donna.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland asks his stepdaughter to accompany him to her school's father/daughter dance, only a family pet problem may ruin everything.
episodes.title: Da Daggone Daddy-Daughter Dinner Dance

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to get his son more friends, Cleveland invites over Lester's son Ernie, only to have him accidentally get taken away by child services.
episodes.title: The One About Friends

episodes.synopsis: Tim the bear gets Cleveland a job as a cable telemarketer, while Rallo and Roberta try and help Cleveland Jr. get in touch with his feelings.
episodes.title: Birth of a Salesman

episodes.synopsis: After overhearing about the birds and the bees, a terrified Cleveland Jr. takes a vow of chastity, despite the embarrassment it brings his dad.
episodes.title: Cleveland Jr.'s Cherry Bomb

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland is upset when he learns that Donna is still going to a single mother's group just so she can have a good time.
episodes.title: Ladies Night

episodes.synopsis: It's a fun-filled Thanksgiving with Cleveland's new family, who finds out a surprising secret about one of his relatives.
episodes.title: A Brown Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: With Cleveland Jr. and Roberta on a school trip, Rallo tries his best to keep his mother all to himself and away from Cleveland.
episodes.title: From Bed to Worse

episodes.synopsis: Dressed as Santa Claus at the office party, a drunk Cleveland tells Rallo the truth about his father, while Roberta becomes an animal rights activist.
episodes.title: A Cleveland Brown Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland becomes the head coach of a newly formed baseball team at his old high school, and tries to convince Cleveland Jr. to join the roster.
episodes.title: Field of Streams

episodes.synopsis: Roberta's new teacher encourages her to alter her appearance, fooling Cleveland Jr., who ends up falling in love with the disguised Roberta.
episodes.title: Love Rollercoaster

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland tries to take a group of troubled teens under his wing, only things take a bad turn when Cleveland is the one who ends up in trouble.
episodes.title: Our Gang

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland plays matchmaker, setting up his lonely friend Holt with a fiery redhead who becomes more trouble than Holt can handle.
episodes.title: Buried Pleasures

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland Jr. starts a father-son rivalry when he begins making changes at his new job, which happens to be at Cleveland's favorite bar.
episodes.title: The Curious Case of Cleveland Jr. Working at the Stool

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland and Roberta go on a honeymoon to New York, only Cleveland ends up spending more time with his friends, who tagged along for the trip.
episodes.title: Once Upon a Tyne in New York

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland is wounded after he and Donna are mugged while using an ATM, and Cleveland is hailed as being a hero for protecting her.
episodes.title: The Brown Knight

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland's gas problems at karaoke embarrass Donna. And an unexpected death from someone in his past leaves Cleveland an emotional mess.
episodes.title: Gone with the Wind

episodes.synopsis: After taking an interest in his girlfriend, Cleveland Jr. decides to man up and challenges Stoolbend's top rapper to a rap battle.
episodes.title: Brotherly Love

episodes.synopsis: After getting into a fight, neighbors Cleveland and Lester are forced to work together on a float for a parade in the Stoolbend Unity Parade.
episodes.title: Brown History Month

episodes.synopsis: Kendra enlists the help of Donna and Arianna after learning that Cleveland lost Roberta's college fund to a crooked con man.
episodes.title: Cleveland's Angels

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland Jr. inherits his mom's fortune. Meanwhile, Cleveland's parents announce they're getting married and plan on moving to Stoolbend.
episodes.title: You're the Best Man, Cleveland Brown!

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland learns the kid he bullied at camp grew up to be President. Cleveland takes a rapper under his wing, who ditches him after a hit single.
episodes.title: Harder, Better, Faster, Browner

episodes.synopsis: A special "live" episode celebrating Donna and Cleveland's anniversary, only strange events keep interrupting the festivities.
episodes.title: Cleveland Live!

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland takes a tropical vacation to try and get his groove back after losing a basketball game to Lester.
episodes.title: How Cleveland Got His Groove Back

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland is shocked that Cleveland Jr. still wants to dress up and trick or treat for Halloween, so he tries to teach him how to act his age.
episodes.title: It's the Great Pancake, Junior Brown

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland disguises Holt as a baseball player in order to win the high school state championship after his star player gets injured.
episodes.title: Little Man on Campus

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland Jr. and Kendra try and pass a bill to grant equal rights to overweight people after the family spends the day at the pool.
episodes.title: Fat & Wet

episodes.synopsis: During a Thanksgiving visit, Cleveland gets stuck with with his sister-in-law's kids after she runs off to Vegas to elope with Holt.
episodes.title: Another Bad Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: Rallo befriends an elderly Jewish man at a retirement home, while Cleveland trains for a boxing match against his overbearing father.
episodes.title: Murray Christmas

episodes.synopsis: To prove he's not lazy, Cleveland recruits his buddies from Quahog to participate in the town's first annual charity Beer Walk.
episodes.title: Beer Walk!

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland Jr. becomes jealous when Cleveland bonds with Rallo over his favorite sheep riding hobby, 'mutton bustin.'
episodes.title: Ain't Nothin' But Mutton Bustin'

episodes.synopsis: Donna leaves Cleveland alone to take care of Roberta for the weekend, only Cleveland's attempt at parenting by himself backfires.
episodes.title: How Do You Solve a Problem Like Roberta

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland tries to sabotage Tim's promotion at Waterman Cable. Meanwhile, Rallo tricks Cleveland Jr. into thinking the class turtle can talk.
episodes.title: Like a Boss

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland and Donna get tickets to the All-Star basketball game in Los Angeles, where a drunk Cleveland learns his lesson after insulting the players.
episodes.title: A Short Story and a Tall Tale

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland is shocked to learn that he and Donna aren't legally married, and also discovers that his friend Terry is gay.
episodes.title: Terry Unmarried

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland learns the truth behind his town's legacy and takes it upon himself to change history and take back his town.
episodes.title: The Blue & the Gray & the Brown

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland learns that his parents have been selling his childhood possessions after they were scammed out of their life savings by a con man.
episodes.title: The Way the Cookie Crumbles

episodes.synopsis: Lester loses his life savings after investing in Cleveland's beer truck business, and is so upset, he resorts to taking his own life...or does he?
episodes.title: To Live & Die in VA

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland's high school classmate "Fatty Patty," now skinny and beautiful, still has a crush on Cleveland and tries to steal his "essence.
episodes.title: Essence of Cleveland

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland has to choose between joining his friend's team or his new celebrity idol's team at Stoolbend's annual boat race.
episodes.title: Ship'rect

episodes.synopsis: Jealous that Cleveland Jr. doesn't think he's as cool as Donna's ex-husband Robert, Cleveland challenges him to a "Coolympics" competition.
episodes.title: Back to Cool

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland takes some tips from successful daytime talk shows that appeal to women, after his cable-access show receives less than favorable reviews.
episodes.title: Your Show of Shows

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland takes his family to a comic convention to try and sell his comic book, only to discover that Donna once starred in a Blaxploitation film.
episodes.title: Hot Cocoa Bang Bang

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland is upset when he finds out that his supposed best friend Peter Griffin came to Stoolbend and did not call him to hang out.
episodes.title: BFF

episodes.synopsis: When a storm hits the towns of Stoolbend, Quahog and Langley Falls, the Brown/Tubbs family tries to salvage what's left of their vacation.
episodes.title: The Hurricane

episodes.synopsis: When Cleveland and Rallo both come home early from their respective slumber parties, Donna makes them spend the night in a haunted house.
episodes.title: Nightmare on Grace Street

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland is embarrassed when he learns that Cleveland Jr. was the only student to attend school on "skip day." Meanwhile, Rallo gets in an accident.
episodes.title: Skip Day

episodes.synopsis: When Donna joins a women's support group and starts to complain about how Cleveland treats her, Cleveland infiltrates the group.
episodes.title: Yemen Party

episodes.synopsis: When Rallo's friend Murray starts dating Hazel, Rallo realizes that Hazel is a gold digger and tries to save Murray from making a costly mistake.
episodes.title: Sex and the Biddy

episodes.synopsis: To help pass time while posing in a holiday nativity scene, Cleveland tells his own version of one of his favorite holiday stories, "Die Hard."
episodes.title: Die Semi-Hard

episodes.synopsis: When Jr. starts dating an attractive young lady, Cleveland gets green with envy and suspects that the young woman is using Jr. to get a green card.
episodes.title: Y Tu Junior Tambien

episodes.synopsis: After getting himself into several misunderstandings with his new Latina neighbor, Cleveland tries to demonstrate his knowledge of Latino culture.
episodes.title: There Goes El Neighbor

episodes.synopsis: Determined to claim the first place trophy at the Dancing with the Stools ballroom dance competition, Donna recruits Cleveland Jr. to be her partner.
episodes.title: Dancing with the Stools

episodes.synopsis: To spend some father-stepson bonding time with Rallo, Cleveland takes Rallo to his very first magic show, where they get hired to be the opening act.
episodes.title: Brown Magic

episodes.synopsis: When Donna has a midlife crisis, Cleveland must come up with a clever way to sneak off with his buddies on a hunting trip without her finding out.
episodes.title: Til Deaf

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland relies on energy supplements to keep himself awake in order to work and earn enough vacation time to go on a cruise with his family.
episodes.title: Das Shrimp Boot

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland wants to watch a basketball tournament with Freight Train, but he becomes frustrated when Freight Train bonds with Cleveland Jr. instead.
episodes.title: March Dadness

episodes.synopsis: After winning a dance competition that names him "The Whitest Man in America," Cleveland is determined to understand his roots and where he came from.
episodes.title: The Men in Me

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland makes Donna jealous when he gets too close to a co-worker. Later, Rallo and Cleveland Jr. shoot footage of Cleveland's workplace high jinks.
episodes.title: Frapp Attack

episodes.synopsis: One of Rallo's pranks goes too far and gets Cleveland Jr. kicked out of the scouts. So Cleveland threatens to send Rallo to juvenile detention.
episodes.title: American Prankster

episodes.synopsis: It's Homecoming Weekend at Cleveland's alma mater, so he volunteers to accompany Roberta on a college visit as an excuse to relive his college days.
episodes.title: B.M.O.C.

episodes.synopsis: Devout church choir girl Vanessa catches Cleveland Jr.'s eye, and he eagerly volunteers to go on a church trip to be in her good graces.
episodes.title: Jesus Walks

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland Jr. profiles his dad for school, but when Cleveland falls off the toilet and suffers a concussion, he loses Cleveland Jr.'s admiration.
episodes.title: Flush of Genius

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to lift Donna's spirits on Mother's Day, Cleveland hires an actress to play Donna's estranged mother. But her real mom soon turns up!
episodes.title: Mama Drama

episodes.synopsis: Roberta gives Cleveland Jr. a makeover, and his stylish new look gives him with the confidence to approach Daisy, a misfit who catches his attention.
episodes.title: All You Can Eat

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland and the gang get into trouble on enemy turf when they visit their rival high school in Goochland for the big annual football game.
episodes.title: Escape from Goochland

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland confronts the now super-famous rapper Kenny West about not sharing credit for the megahit they created together, "Be-Cleve In Yourself."
episodes.title: Menace II Secret Society

episodes.synopsis: Rallo rounds up a depressed Holt's father to help him get into the holiday spirit when his family doesn't invite him to Thanksgiving dinner.
episodes.title: A General Thanksgiving Episode

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland takes a reluctant Cleveland Jr. to a turkey farm to teach him how to hunt for the family's Thanksgiving dinner.
episodes.title: Turkey Pot Die

episodes.synopsis: When Donna reveals that she wants another baby, Cleveland struggles to keep his vasectomy a secret.
episodes.title: A Vas Deferens Between Men and Women

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland pretends to be homeless so he can eat at the local homeless shelter, where the food is much better than it is at home.
episodes.title: 'Tis the Cleveland to Be Sorry

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland is furious when Donna's ex-husband, Robert, crashes Freight Train's birthday party and upstages Cleveland's gift for his dad.
episodes.title: Hustle 'n' Bros

episodes.synopsis: The Brown-Tubbs family travels the world -- from Italy to Mexico to Japan -- in a hilarious series of internationally-themed segments.
episodes.title: Wide World of Cleveland Show

episodes.synopsis: Donna drags Cleveland to marriage counseling after he botches their wedding vow renewal. Meanwhile, Junior's beloved refrigerator breaks.
episodes.title: Here Comes the Bribe

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland's mom, Cookie, runs away with George Clinton and the P-Funk All-Stars after Freight Train misses the couple's anniversary party.
episodes.title: When a Man (or a Freight Train) Loves His Cookie

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland takes an offer from his boss to quit his job with six months of severance pay, but he struggles to find a way to tell Donna.
episodes.title: Brownsized

episodes.synopsis: Donna manages Rallo's expectations when it comes to bowling while Cleveland, Lester, Holt and Terry take a road trip to an abandoned amusement park.
episodes.title: Pins, Spins, & Fins! (Shark Story Cut for Time)

episodes.synopsis: When Donna discovers a rat in the house, she immediately moves herself and the kids in with her mother, leaving Cleveland to snuff out the vermin.
episodes.title: A Rodent Like This

episodes.synopsis: When Donna runs for a school board seat, she tries to keep Cleveland out of the campaign. But her efforts backfire when he "kills" a new friend.
episodes.title: The Hangover Part Tubbs

episodes.synopsis: The Browns pack their bags and move to Los Angeles, where Cleveland pursues his lifelong dream of becoming a major league baseball scout.
episodes.title: California Dreamin' (All the Cleves Are Brown)

episodes.synopsis: When Arianna the Bear is rude to Donna, Cleveland defends her honor by egging Arianna's house and seeking revenge on everyone in Stoolbend.
episodes.title: Who Done Did It?

episodes.synopsis: Cleveland feels bad for Dr. Fist because he doesn't have any friends, so he decides to make him "one of the guys.
episodes.title: Fist and the Furious

episodes.synopsis: Donna forces a reluctant Rallo to sign up for Stoolbend's version of the Boy Scouts. But he changes his tune when he discovers he can make extra cash.
episodes.title: Squirt's Honor

episodes.synopsis: Rallo heads to East Stoolbend to stay at Robert's for the weekend. But when Robert ducks out, Rallo's forced to make friends with the neighbors.
episodes.title: Grave Danger

episodes.synopsis: After a lice outbreak at school, Rallo must chop off his beloved Afro. But Junior takes him under his wing when his classmates make fun of him.
episodes.title: Of Lice and Men

episodes.synopsis: Donna puts her foot down when Cleveland and his mom, Cookie, are mistaken for husband and wife on a visit to a retirement community.
episodes.title: Mr. & Mrs. Brown

episodes.synopsis: After Freight Train invites Cleveland to a lowrider convention, Dr. Fist reveals that his surprising amiability might be due to dementia.
episodes.title: Crazy Train

episodes.synopsis: Overwhelmed by all the kids' extracurriculars, Cleveland and Donna create an activity wheel and look to their relations for help.
episodes.title: Wheel! Of! Family!
